roleset.name: listen surreptitiously
roleset.note: EAVESDROP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'eavesdrop' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from eavesdrop.01-v predicate notes)
EAVESDROPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from eavesdropping.01-n)

example.name: sneaky sneaky
example.text: ``But we were getting too many complaints that people-1 were using them [*-1] to eavesdrop on their neighbors.''
